title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 6 lots of collectibles up for auction:LOT 1: 2022 MyBits 0.001BTC coinhttps://mempool.space/address/164z8p8LDWUqDxWhLA6nv4tEdN6ebf3xVgSTARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 2: 2022 MyBits 0.001BTC coin + COAhttps://mempool.space/address/14h43PAazorsge9MeaEdPAgkYHqb7Q7imGSTARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 3: 2019 Bitcoin Suisse ETH non-denominated note PCGS 66 PPQSTARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 4: 2019 Bitcoin Suisse ETH non-denominated note PCGS 66 PPQSTARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 5: Shohei Ohtani mixed lot of cardsSTARTING BID: 0.0005BTCLOT 6: Bitcoin beginner box booklet, Slumberjack Arizona coin, Cryptochips coins/notesSTARTING BID: 0.0005BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 24th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: MrMojoRising26
comments.body: Lot #1 is a DIY coin! I offered that option at the time. I just want it to be known I did not make the keys for this coin, and I do not know who assembled it that holo is specifically for DIY coins. Also Lot #2 Is not a DIY coin but, it looks like someone placed, or glued the addy QR code on the hologram that is not my doing. The hologram normally looks like the one on the COA with no QR code on it like pictured above.

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Fuckin' 'ell! I was going to ask why they look different, but this seems almost like a scam attampt That QR code could very well be there to cover up the cut-out holo, so both coins can be redeemed after the sale. Somewhat unlikely with such low loading value, but still...Good to have you here mate!EDIT: I don't mean by minerjones of course.Quote from: MrMojoRising26 on October 19, 2023, 12:41:49 AMLot #1 is a DIY coin! I offered that option at the time. I just want it to be known I did not make the keys for this coin, and I do not know who assembled it that holo is specifically for DIY coins. Also Lot #2 Is not a DIY coin but, it looks like someone placed, or glued the addy QR code on the hologram that is not my doing. The hologram normally looks like the one on the COA with no QR code on it like pictured above.
